pr_title: [CALCITE-4040] An aggregate function that does not support roll up throws an exception when it is rolled up

timeline.bodyText: How about some doc here to explain why matching should fail.
timeline.author: jinxing64

timeline.bodyText: How about some doc to explain why matching should fail when the function doesn't support roll-up.
timeline.author: jinxing64

timeline.bodyText: In current MaterializedViewSubstitutionVisitorTest.java, there's already an testAggregateRollUp. How about rename this as testSqlAggFunctionRollup2 and put it after testAggregateRollUp ?
timeline.author: jinxing64

timeline.message: [CALCITE-4040] An aggregate function that does not support roll up throws an exception when it is rolled up (Xu Zhaohui)
